main event: Two round, shiny objects were observed flying at high speed from north to south at an altitude of about 12,000 feet.
interesting points: The objects were several times larger than planes., The sighting lasted for approximately 2-3 seconds., The objects changed direction sharply and disappeared., No sounds or exhaust were reported during the sighting., Likely identified as possible aircraft but could not confirm metallic nature.
